page.title: 13BEEHIVE PUB
page.content: The Beehive pub looks quite grubby from the outside and painted in white and red colours.The inside was surprisingly small with a little bar at one end of it and some seats and benches at the other.There were three people in the pub including the bar attendant. The walls were full of pictures. There is no entertainment in the evening but it gets quite a few customers most of which are locals. The owner starts his day at about 7.30am. and does not finish his work till midnight. He does have a break in the afternoon. The inside of the pub is pleasant and the owners wife said she has worked there for twenty-one years. She thinks it was much better back in the sixties.
